# jaysroutine

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of jaysroutine is to streamline the process before starting data analysis.

## Installation

You can install the released version of jaysroutine from [Github](https://github.com/jaylkim/jaysroutine).

``` r
remotes::install_github("jaylkim/jaysroutine")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how it works: 

```{r example, eval = FALSE}
library(jaysroutine)

jayswork("analysis.Rmd")
```
